name: deploy-project
description: Project deployment files with comprehensive linting

scripts.lint: echo 'Ì¥ç Running ESLint...' && npx eslint GAMES/Dungeon/assets/dungeon-game.js --format=compact
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Ì¥ß Auto-fixing linting issues...' && npx eslint GAMES/Dungeon/assets/dungeon-game.js --fix
scripts.format: echo 'Ì≤Ö Formatting code...' && npx prettier --write GAMES/Dungeon/assets/dungeon-game.js
scripts.format:check: echo 'Ì¥ç Checking code formatting...' && npx prettier --check GAMES/Dungeon/assets/dungeon-game.js
scripts.lint:all: echo 'Ì∫Ä Running comprehensive linting...' && npm run lint && echo '' && npm run format:check
scripts.fix:all: echo 'Ì¥ß Running comprehensive fixes...' && npm run lint:fix && echo '' && npm run format

author: User
